title: Must Watch: Steve Peat pits 2006 Santa Cruz V10 against 2021 Model at Le Pleney
content:
2006 Peaty versus 2021 Peaty. Which will come out on top? Steve Peat pits his 2006 World Cup Overall Winning V10 against the 2021 model in Old vs. New. That’s a bike with a 1344mm wheelbase and 29″ wheels versus a bike with a 1192mm wheelbase and 26″ wheels… striking differences before we even get

The post Must Watch: Steve Peat pits 2006 Santa Cruz V10 against 2021 Model at Le Pleney appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
